title: (HNP eSports) Looking for Casters! - Twitch
body:
Hello,

We are currently looking to put together a casting team to stream our matches on twitch!
This is a big milestone for our organisation and we would be honoured for you to be a part of it.
/
Be a nice guy & have decent internet {enough for a call. You do not have to host the stream}.
Please complete the form attached if you are interested.
/
- Hnp dawg (Owner of HNP eSports)
